item.title: Shuo Zhan's HomePage
item.description: About me This is a simple page for academic website based on Hugo. It just provides a theme frame and all depends on your markdown posts’ styles. This is the index page which organized with the posts you write in markdown files.(with Front matter true) News 2022-04-27: version 1.1.0 published，support switch language. 2022-04-21: first version 1.0.0 published. 2022-04-20: first init commit. Publications [1] Kaiming He, Xiangyu Zhang, Shaoqing Ren, Jian Sun; Proceedings of the IEEE Conference on Computer Vision and Pattern Recognition (CVPR), 2016, pp.
